description: As a Frontend Developer at Qoruz, I specialized in crafting user-centric digital experiences and transforming complex requirements into sleek, functional designs. I worked alongside a talented team to enhance interface usability and performance.
As a freelance developer, I understood client's requirement and have worked closely to deliver beautiful UI. I worked with Storybook to make global components that can be easily accessed..
Worked remotely with the founder and senior developer in Angular js. Made dashboard component from scratch and developed the onboarding calendly like scheduler.
At Economize, I wrote technical blogs and developed my inter personal skills. I worked closely with co-founder and built strong time management skills.
TBC taught me how to deal and negotiate with clients. I worked on strict deadlines, wrote content for clients, made videos for clients.
I was the Executive member of content team in (MU-ACM). I got my hands on new experiences. I wrote descriptive emails, whatsapp invitation messages and event invitations etc.
